description: Order of (4,n) cage, i.e. minimal order of 4-regular graph of girth n.
comments: a(9) <= 275, a(10) <= 384, a(12) = 728. - From Royle's page via _Jason Kimberley_, Dec 26 2012
links: Geoff Exoo, Regular graphs of given degree and girth
G. Exoo and R. Jajcay, Dynamic cage survey, Electr. J. Combin. (2008, 2011).
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Cage Graph (claims too much)
author: _Erich Friedman_
